body_content.explanation: the willingness to give a lot of time and energy to something because it is important:
examples: He has always shown great dedication to the cause.
She thanked the staff for their dedication and enthusiasm.

body_content.explanation: a statement that says in whose honour something has been written, made, performed, etc.:
examples: The dedication at the front of the book read "For my Father".

body_content.explanation: a ceremony in which a building, especially a religious building, is opened for use and its purpose is stated
